@echo off
Title BUCLE
color 2B
:repetir
echo 1010101000011010101010101111010101110110101101010101010101010010000100101111111101010101010101011111101000010110110111101011001001011011011010011001
echo.
echo 1010101000011010101010101111010101110110101101010101010101010010000100101111111101010101010101011111101000010110110111101011001001011011011010011001
goto repetir
exit
